title: Are we not gonna talk about pantheons spear?
body:
tldr; Pantheons spear is a better, faster, stronger version of nidalees. 

Am I joke to you {{champion:76}}

replies.body: If you get hit by Panth's spear, it does damage and sometimes slows. If you get hit by Nid's spear, it does damage and sometimes she jumps at your face and deletes you. They are different champions.
Except Nid's spear deals a ton more damage than Panth's throughout all stages of the game.
